content: Not zulip related :troll: but I was curious about the decrease in on-camera meeting uploads to YT: https://www.youtube.com/c/RustVideos/videos
The lang team no longer records their meeting IIRC
To make people more comfortable attending; we had multiple people provide feedback on that.

We still plan to record some design meetings, when we have an outside speaker and want to record and share their presentation. We're just no longer recording triage meetings and other design meetings.

It was a trade-off, and we absolutely considered both the upsides and downsides. In particular, we need to be much more careful about better minutes now. We needed to do that anyway, but now it's a necessity..
